summary: VEHICLE WENT INTO "LIMP MODE" WHILE TRAVELING AT HIGH SPEED CREATING A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION.  THIS OCCURRED 2 MORE TIMES BEFORE I COULD GET AN APPOINTMENT AT THE DEALER.  THE DEALER COULD NOTE FIND ANY CODES BUT DECIDED MY ELECTRONIC THROTTLE BODY WAS DEFECTIVE AND NOT COVERED UNDER MY POWER TRAIN WARRANTY.  FORD CUSTOMER SERVICE EXTENDED WARRANTIES FOR OTHER VEHICLES WITH THE SAME PART BUT WILL NOT INCLUDE MY VEHICLE.
